metadata.title: Friday, 22nd April, 2016
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Vice President and Minister of Development Planning
parts: (a)    whether the Government has finished considering the Commission of Inquiry Report into the Mongu Riots which occurred on 14th January, 2011; and
(b)    when the findings will be released to the public.

questions.minister: Minister of Youth, Sport and Child Development
parts: (a)    whether the Government has any plans to rehabilitate the infrastructure and revive activities at Chinyunyu Youth Resource Centre in Rufunsa District;
(b)    if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c)    if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Energy and Water Development
parts: (a)    what the progress on the electrification of Milenge District is;
(b)    whether the project is on schedule;
(c)    if it is not on schedule, why; and

(d)    what the new completion date is. PRESENTATION OF GOVERNMENT BILLS The Minister of Home Affairs The Immigration and Deportation (Amendment) – Bill to amend the Immigration and Deportation Act, 2010.                 (N.A.B. 13/2016) Minister of Justice The High Court (Amendment) – Bill to amend the High Court Act.                                                                             (N.A.B. 15/2016)
